name: vampire hotel
description:
You're a vampire allergic to type A blood. You make your way through a hotel, drinking the guest's blood and hoping they don't have the wrong blood type. Your allergic reaction will grow overtime until it becomes lethal, or you starve to death.

Made for the 72 hour mini jam, didn't have much time to work on it this weekend. My initial goal was for the player to run around a hospital, avoiding detection, and stealing donated blood, since they have their blood type marked on them.
